articles.description: HIGH cholesterol is a serious health risk, but small, simple swaps can really make a positive difference to your longevity. An expert dietician shares her top tips you can incorporate into 2021 and for the rest of your life.

articles.title: The priority list for the Covid vaccines - and how you will be contacted - The Telegraph
articles.description: The Covid-19 vaccination programme is under way - the largest in British history
articles.content:
How will the storage requirements of the Pfizer vaccine affect the programme?
The vaccine must be stored at -70C to be effective, meaning it can only be delivered to GPs with the facilities to keep … [+8501 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus new strain symptoms: Three signs you may have already had the virus - Express
articles.description: THE NEW strain of coronavirus currently ravishing the UK has been shown to spread quicker and proven more lethal. Spotting symptoms of the virus and isolating is key right now to controlling its spread. But there are a number of signs you may have already had…
